text:
Apple is reportedly working on a major 20th anniversary redesign for the iPhone 19 Pro alongside a foldable iPhone 

The new design will make a 'more extensive use of glass'

Source: @markgurman

Full story: https://bloomberg.com/news/newsletters/2025-04-06/will-apple-raise-iphone-prices-in-the-us-after-trump-tariffs-iphone-17-details?cmpid=BBD040625_POWERON&utm_medium=email&utm_source=newsletter&utm_term=250406&utm_campaign=poweron…

Every year we see these "Bold" reports about a New and A exciting iPhone, often a year before it's released.

When the device is actually released however it tends to disappoint and show that most of the rumors were false.
$4000 after Trump’s tariffs
Just got an iPhone 16 Pro Max last year, so I will probably hold out for this anniversary redesign!
iPhone 19 Pro  iPhone X
Apple is reportedly working on a major 40th anniversary redesign for the iPhone XXX Pro alongside a foldable iPhone.
19 pro.. we aint even got the 17 released yet lol
iPhone X2

Phew, no two-toned iPhone 17 Pro/Pro Max.

So finally most of the ridiculous looking "demo, render, and pulled out of the sky units" can all just stop. 

Now onto the major overhaul of iOS...
HOLD UP apple we don’t even a iPhone 17 series or 18 release date yet and talking bout iPhone 19

I'd rather see more titanium. There's no value to "more glass" - whatever it is, I'll be putting a case on it, so you won't see the glass. 
Like most phone owners, I don't care what it looks like. I care about how it functions. Give me more powerful SoC's, with 16-32GB of RAM for
And they will charge $5k for this coz it's made of glass
No one wants a foldable phone
They should call the iPhone X^2
Apple will probably put the camera and other sensors behind the display with this. Would make sense

Need to fix the camera so it is flush with the phone.
So one should wait for iPhone 19 instead of wasting money

great

time to put those plans on hold since iPhones are "about to cost 30k due to tariffs"
Thats where we will get the name change
They’ll most likely skip 19 and just name it 20. Better marketing decision.
iPhone Pixel?
For its decade milestone, Apple introduced the iPhone X, which was truly a radical departure from previous models. The iPhone 19 will most likely repeat that history.
iOS will also adopt a similar design language then, VisionOS kind of similar with a lot of translucent design elements.

They probably won’t call it the iPhone 19 given that they dropped calling an iPhone 9 series for their 10th anniv iPhone X model. The iPhone XS/XR series should’ve been dropped and should’ve went straight to iPhone 11 so that the 20th anniv iPhone series is actually iPhone 20

2025 iPhone 17 & iPhone 17 Pro
